nodes.bodyText: We could return 300 directly as it's done in SysPropConfigSource
Either way works for me.  There's only one instance of the class so there's no significant space difference either way.
Unless you want to increase your LoC report, I'd prefer to return 300 directly without changing the constructor.  :)
Ah, in this case it's important to make it be explicit to support #3670.
